---
id: unsubscribe-from-mod
title: "Unsubscribe From Mod"
description: "Unsubscribe the _authenticated user_ from the corresponding mod. No body parameters are required for this action. Successful request will return `204 No Content`.<br /><br />__NOTE:__ Users can unsubscribe from mods via mod.io, we recommend you poll or call the [Get Mod Events](/restapi/docs/get-mod-events) endpoint when needed, to keep a users mods collection up to date."
sidebar_label: "Unsubscribe From Mod"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "delete api-method"
info_path: restapi/docs/mod-io-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Unsubscribe From Mod"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/mods/{mod-id}/subscribe"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Unsubscribe the _authenticated user_ from the corresponding mod. No body parameters are required for this action. Successful request will return `204 No Content`.<br /><br />__NOTE:__ Users can unsubscribe from mods via mod.io, we recommend you poll or call the [Get Mod Events](/restapi/docs/get-mod-events) endpoint when needed, to keep a users mods collection up to date.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"mod-id","in":"path","description":"Mod ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"Successful Request. No Body Returned.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"204","type":"object","default":"204 No Content"}}}},"400":{"description":"The requested user is not currently subscribed to the requested mod.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","description":"Standard API error response.","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/introduction#response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"15005":"The requested user is not currently subscribed to the requested mod."}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
